roleset.name: make compact, compress
roleset.note: COMPACT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'compact' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from compact.01-v predicate notes)
COMPACT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for ICE.

example.name: ARG1
example.text: Mr. Johnson , of the Berkeley seismographic station , said : `` Landfill can be done if it 's properly compacted .

example.name: compaction-n
example.text: Vibratory plate and spiked or pad roller compactors (at right) can be attached to tracked excavators to provide mechanical compaction of trench backfill, mostly for buried utilities.
